name: We Found Light
description:
Play as The Wanderer in this 2D Platformer where the you use the Recoil of your Gun to do a variety of movements and attacks 

How To Play : 

Aim with Mouse 

Charge and Shoot by Holding and Releasing Left Click Button 

Credits :

- Muhammad Asfian - Game Designer 

- Hardwin Welly Tulili Panandu - Programmer & Game Designer 

- Taufik Setyawan - Artist 

- Ibnu Yudha Raul Pratama Yunaz - Artist
